PLATEAU Workshop
Bringing together Programming Languages and Human-Computer Interaction
Home Registration Program Prior Year Sites

PLATEAU2023
13th annual workshop on the intersection of HCI and PL
@ Carnegie Mellon University, Pittsburgh PA USA February 13-14, 2023

PLATEAU will take place on the Carnegie Mellon University campus in Pittsburgh, PA from February 13-14, 2023.

Attending PLATEAU is free, and it is open to the public. To attend, please complete our registration form.

We've reserved a block of rooms at the Hilton Garden Inn, University Place. Contact Samantha Mudrinich for additional information on reserving a room.

Important Dates
Wednesday, December 7th, 2022 (AoE time)
Paper Submission
Tuesday, January 10th, 2023 (AoE time)
Backup Paper Submission (See Rolling Reviewing for details)
